description:
Last month, 6 students went to Mission Bon Accueille to help package produce for their food bank. Marché Bon Accueil is a free grocery store that provides fresh and healthy produce. 

Mission Bon Accueil is the largest doorway to help for Montrealers in need. Programs and resources are available to support people experiencing homelessness, families living in precarity, young and single mothers, at-risk youth and the elderly.
